name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior Software Engineer with 10+ years of comprehensive experience in developing robust software solutions, emphasizing a strong command of **C**, **C++**, and **Java** within Agile and Scrum frameworks. Proficient in **Linux** environments and experienced in containerization using **Docker** for efficient deployment workflows, along with version control expertise in **Git** and **Subversion**. Skilled in AWS for cloud solutions and capable of system integration, bolstered by a solid foundation in **Python** and other modern technologies. 

Demonstrated ability to effectively solve complex problems and enhance team collaboration through excellent communication skills, adept in using **Jira** and **Confluence** for project management. Passionate about leveraging software engineering best practices to create impactful solutions while adhering to industry standards and compliance. 

Bringing substantial hands-on experience in full stack development, including utilization of **React**, **Node.js**, and **Django**, with a focus on building microservices and event-driven architectures. Committed to continuous improvement and driving real-time analytics capabilities in software systems.

experience.responsibilities:
•	Utilized **Python** in implementing full-stack solutions for complex systems, focusing on system integration to enhance performance and scalability in healthcare and finance sectors.
•	Applied Agile and Scrum methodologies to promote collaboration and continuous improvement, leading cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software products on time.
•	Developed and maintained CI/CD pipelines using **Docker**, **Git**, and **AWS**, enhancing deployment efficiency by **30%** through automated workflows.
•	Conducted system integration projects employing **Apache Camel** and **Apache Kafka**, enabling seamless data flow and interoperability across monolithic and microservices applications.
•	Worked with **Linux** environments to build and deploy applications, ensuring high availability and security in production systems.
•	Leveraged version control systems like **Git** and **Subversion** to manage codebase and collaboration, fostering effective communication and teamwork among developers.
•	Champion problem-solving and communication initiatives to address and adapt to evolving project requirements, achieving a **15%** reduction in critical project bottlenecks.
•	Participated in design reviews and architecture sessions, utilizing **Enterprise Architect** for high-level system design visualizations that guided development strategies.
•	Streamlined project tracking and documentation using **Jira** and **Confluence**, ensuring all team members were aligned and informed with project progress and deliverables.
•	Designed technical solutions based on business needs while mentoring junior developers in **Agile practices** and software engineering principles, enhancing team productivity by **20%**.

Utilized **Agile** and **Scrum** methodologies to lead the development and modernization of financial platforms, enhancing team collaboration and project delivery speed by **20%**.
Expertly developed scalable, maintainable microservices using **Node.js** (NestJS/Express) and **Python** (FastAPI, Django), resulting in a **30%** increase in system throughput for high-volume transaction environments.
Designed and implemented user-friendly front-end applications with **React** (18), **Vue 3**, **Next.js**, and **TypeScript**, achieving a **15%** improvement in user experience on financial dashboards and admin portals.
Developed real-time transaction monitoring and analytics dashboards leveraging **React**, **D3.js**, and **Power BI Embedded**, empowering operations teams to track financial activity and generate actionable insights.
Integrated **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus** to establish robust event-driven architecture, facilitating real-time processing and communication for transactions and compliance workflows.
Constructed and managed ETL pipelines with **Python**, **Apache Airflow**, and **Azure Data Factory**, enabling seamless batch and real-time data ingestion from both internal and external financial systems.
Executed AI/ML-driven fraud detection systems using **scikit-learn**, **XGBoost**, and **Azure Machine Learning**, successfully analyzing transaction patterns to proactively flag suspicious activities, improving fraud detection rates by at least **25%**.
Created machine learning pipelines for credit scoring, churn prediction, and transaction classification using **MLflow** and **Airflow**, integrating model inference directly into backend services for responsive decision-making.

Developed and optimized clean and efficient code in **C**, **C++**, and **Java**, ensuring best practices are followed in software design and architecture for high-performance applications in line with Agile methodologies.
Implemented and maintained CI/CD practices using **Docker**, **Git**, and **Subversion** for streamlined code deployments, enhancing collaboration within the software development team and ensuring timely delivery of features.
Engineered backend services and integrated systems on **Linux** environments, collaboratively troubleshooting and resolving application issues, thereby improving system stability and availability in a fast-paced e-commerce landscape.
Conducted regular team scrums and utilized **Jira** and **Confluence** for efficient project management and documentation, ensuring clear communication within cross-functional teams and adhering to Agile principles.
Leveraged **AWS** for cloud services, optimizing resource allocation and reducing operational costs by **30%** while ensuring system scalability and security.
Developed robust, scalable applications utilizing **Apache Camel** and **Apache Kafka** for system integration, achieving **99.9%** uptime for mission-critical services.
Employed **Puppet** for configuration management across multiple servers, improving deployment consistency and reducing rollout times by **25%**.
Participated actively in team brainstorming sessions, applying strong problem-solving skills to tackle complex software challenges and deliver innovative solutions that meet user needs.
Fostered a culture of teamwork and open communication, providing mentorship and guidance to junior engineers and promoting knowledge sharing across the team.
